sourcesContent:
// Install the required packages if not already done // npm install react bootstrap tailwindcss import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; const HowItWorks = () => { return (

How it works?

Buyers post their needs and review top suppliers, while suppliers complete profiles, connect with potential buyers, and build successful business relationships, sharing valuable feedback.

{/* Card 1 */}
👤

Select Your Role and Sign Up

Choose your role, either as a buyer or supplier, and sign up to get started.

{/* Card 2 */}
📄

Buyers Post Your Requirements

Buyers can post their requirements to find suitable suppliers.

{/* Card 3 */}
🔍

Review, Select, and Contact the Best Suppliers

Review profiles and choose the best suppliers to connect with.

{/* Card 5 */}
🤝

Both the Parties can Connect and Make Business Leave a Feedback

Complete the business transaction and leave feedback to build trust.

{/* Card 4 */}
📧

Contact to Buyers and Share your Quote for the service

Suppliers can connect with buyers and share a quote for their service.

); }; export default HowItWorks;
